backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining feature requests, user profiles, announcements, assignments, and study tasks with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping required UI features to source files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of key frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme and dark mode variables with base styling overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that loads the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application entry defining routes, theme provider, layout wrapper, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentChatbo: Complex multilingual assignment assistant chatbot with text, voice, OCR, suggestions, and download capabilities.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main site layout with header navigation, mobile menu, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StudentSathiAssi: Implements an interactive assistant with messaging, voice input, OCR via Tesseract, and assignment generation logic.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Sub: Renders a subject badge with color styling based on subject metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for feature requests, assignment parsing, confirmation, conversation saving, and study planner actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerSort.t: Manages and persists the user’s study planner sort mode in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerView.t: Manages and stores the study planner view preference (daily or weekly) in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS and defines light and dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
Provides a multi-language assignment formatting tool with title page inputs, formatting options, an editor, AI improvements, and download features.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a hero section and grid of navigation cards linking to various student tools within the app.
Generates a formatted leave application letter based on user input and allows copying the result.
frontend/src/pages/NotesCleanerPage.tsx: Cleans and formats rough notes by capitalizing, punctuating, and spacing text, with copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RequestFeaturePage.ts: Lets users submit feature requests with optional email, sending data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeBuilderPage.tsx: Builds a simple resume from user-provided details and projects, generating a text resume with copy support.
frontend/src/pages/StudyPlannerPage.tsx: Main Study Planner page handling task creation, filtering, sorting, guest mode, and authenticated tasks.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerGuestStor: Manages guest-mode study tasks using localStorage, including CRUD operations and ID handling.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerPdfExport: Generates printable HTML for tasks and opens it for PDF export via the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerSort.ts: Provides deterministic sorting for study tasks by date/time or default ID order.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTaskDateT: Converts date/time inputs to backend formats and formats stored timestamps for display.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTxtExport: Exports study tasks to a plain-text file with summary and formatted task details.
frontend/src/utils/subjectColorMapping.t: Maps subjects to consistent color names and returns corresponding badge and indicator CSS classes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the current UI‑only fix requirements for the study task list app, including layout rules, regressions, and architectural constraints.
unknown.txt: Lists features and UI behavior for an assignment editor system and embedded Student Sathi Assistant, including formatting, downloads, autosave, and chat UI rules.
